course_title: Special Topics in Music: Music Traditions of South Asia
class_notes:
(Same as MESAS 205R 1)
The ensemble this year is learning to sing and play Qawwali (Sufi Islamic music from South Asia) and Kirtan (Bhakti Hindu music from South Asia), accompanied with harmonium and tabla.   No previous experience with Indian music is required to join. The lyrics are in Hindi, Urdu and Persian, but you really don't need to know the languages to learn the music.
course_description: Seminar or lecture series of topics in music. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
sections: Class Nbr: 2950, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 7-9p, Instructor: S. Kugle, Status: Open
